abstract: Rio Tinto, the giant mining company, said it could sell more assets and reschedule debt if a proposed $19.5 billion merger with the Aluminum Company of China, or Chinalco, fails to materialize.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto, the giant mining company, said it could sell more assets and reschedule debt if a proposed $19.5 billion merger with the Aluminum Company of China, or Chinalco, fails to materialize.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Prepares Back-Up Plans if Chinalco Deal Fails
